text.div:
SARS (Tests for SARS_CoV Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    33964-8 SARS coronavirus Urbani RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    33965-5 SARS coronavirus Urbani RNA [Presence] in Stool by NAA with probe detection
    33966-3 SARS coronavirus Urbani RNA [Presence] in Nose by NAA with probe detection
    33967-1 SARS coronavirus Urbani RNA [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    33975-4 SARS coronavirus Urbani RNA [Presence] in Sputum by NAA with probe detection
    41458-1 SARS coronavirus RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    60534-5 SARS coronavirus RNA [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
